name: ChessLike Summoner
description:
Entry for the 7DRL 2021 Game Jam!

A first time solo project.

Several underestimated how long it takes to code chess.

No sound.

In this roguelike, you must defeat your foes and protect yourself the only way you know how, with chess!

Your foes are many, but you have tactics, positioning, and promoting on your side!
